li.label: automaphobe
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] despises artificial humanoids. {PAWN_pronoun} sees them as the potential downfall of all biological sentience.

li.label: anthrophobe
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] despises biological humanoids. {PAWN_pronoun} sees them as a disease that must be snuffed out.

li.label: anthrophile
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] exists to serve humanity. {PAWN_pronoun} has an unshakable yet endearing infatuation with biological sentience.
